home.content: Greetings, everyone! I'm Manson Fang, and a warm welcome to my portfolio.

aboutme.content: As a graduate engineer from the University of Technology Sydney, my educational journey has fueled my development, yet there's still a wealth of untapped knowledge to explore.

projects.content: Check out my personal projects through clicking the button below.

project1.description: 3D portfolio that provides interactive functionality and fun animations. Built with Javascript, React, Three.js, Tailwind CSS, and Blender.

project2.description: An interactive and entertaining browser-based guessing game with a user-friendly React GUI, offering word-based challenges, engaging and approachable hints, and a visually engaging design for an immersive and enjoyable player experience.

project3.description: A cool JavaScript flying game with fun controls and great visuals. The plan is to build a simulator using real-time flight data, incorporating both global and local coordinates. Exciting updates, including collision detection and a weapons system, are on the way for even more fun.

project4.description: A cool virtual slot machine game, with fun and engaging interactions. Built with Javascript, React, Three.js, Tailwind CSS, and Blender.

work.content: Check out my work experience through clicking the button below.

experience.name: Woolworths, Chatswood East
experience.description: Provided to managerial support for grocery manage through running the day-to-day routine and operation when required, provided coaching and training team members whilst maintained the standard and integrity of both the shop floor, back of house and inventory standard

experience.name: Woolworths, Chatswood East
experience.description: Managed the opening of a brand-new retail store. Undertook grocery routine ranging from morning shop scan, processing stock, inventor checks and back of house maintenance

experience.name: Woolworths. Neutral Bay Village
experience.description: Undertook grocery routine ranging from morning shop scan, processing stock, inventor checks and back of house maintenance
